        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">What is static charge?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was ist statische Ladung?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quelle est charge statique ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que é carga de estática?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa è carica statica?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι είναι στατική δαπάνη;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cuál es carga estática?</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lab exercise uses ordinary household materials to explore static charge.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Laborübung benutzt gewöhnliche Haushalt 
Materialien, um statische Ladung zu erforschen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet exercice de laboratoire emploie les matériaux 
ordinaires de ménage pour explorer la charge statique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este exercício do laboratório usa materiais ordinários 
da casa explorar a carga de estática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa esercitazione del laboratorio usa i materiali 
ordinari della famiglia per esplorare la carica statica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η άσκηση εργαστηρίων χρησιμοποιεί τα συνηθισμένα
οικιακά υλικά για να ερευνήσει τη στατική δαπάνη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este ejercicio del laboratorio utiliza los materiales 
ordinarios de la casa para explorar la carga estática.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
